version_description:
• Embark on four all new adventures in the special Thanksgiving Feast Mystery event!
• Earn platinum eagles for limited time event weapons
• Graphical enhancements and new effects added to environments
• Enhancements and fixes to bullet time

• Introducing Competitive Target Shooting for the first time ever in Deer Hunter. Test your marksman skills in real time against other players. Rise up through the ranks to claim big purses of Platinum Eagles and unique weapons!
• Play the new Twiste
Bug fixes and other improvements to game performance
Bug fixes and other improvements to game performance

Deer Hunter 2.1 is here!

New Elite Challenges
-Revisit all new missions in Alaska and Texas
-Test your skills in Pistol Hunts
-Elite Weapon Series enable infinite replay of your favorite missions

Build Custom Guns
-Keep playing t
Bug fixes and other improvements to game performance

Celebrate 4th of July with Deer Hunter!
• Track and Hunt Amazing NEW Creatures!
• Grab and Equip NEW Holiday Themed weapons!
• Bug fixes and other improvements to game performance

Celebrate 4th of July with Deer Hunter!
• Track and Hunt Amazing NEW Creatures!
• Grab and Equip NEW Holiday Themed weapons!
• Bug fixes and other improvements to game performance
Bug fixes and other improvements to game performance
Bug fixes and other improvements to game performance

• Introducing Hunting Dogs – Labrador Retrievers, German Shepherds, Terriers, Dalmatians and more!Acquire and train your Dogs to help you on dangerous hunts.
• Four new Hunt Types – Put your Dogs to the test!Rely on their tracking ability to bag rare g

• Introducing Hunting Dogs – Labrador Retrievers, German Shepherds, Terriers, Dalmatians and more! Acquire and train your dogs to help you on dangerous hunts
• Collect Stamps to unlock cool alternative new looks for your dogs, and boost their Max Stats

• New holiday themed event and weapons
• Bug fixes and other improvements to game performance

Underwater Spearfishing - Introducing an all-new way to hunt!
• Explore a mysterious new world - Dive into the Great Barrier Reef, Red Sea, Caribbean Basin and other exotic areas
• Hunt 100+ new species - Encounter menacing sharks and rare and exoti
Bug fixes and other improvements to game performance

New Underwater Mode: Predator Hunts – Hunt or be hunted!
• Equip yourself with new Heavy Spearguns
• Hunt dozens of deadly sharks and other exotic predators
• New 360° camera movement
• Track your prey with the new Sonar map
“Hunting with D

• New 30-Day Investment IAP Pack - Come back every day to collect bonus gold
• Improved UI & usability in Underwater Spearfishing modes
• Bug fixes and other improvements

New campaign: Historical Hunts – Birth of a new Nation!
• Lead the exciting life of a rugged frontiersman from the 1700’s
• Survive the untamed frontiers in the New World
• Shoot with historical weaponry including Long Rifles & Flintlock Pist

New campaign: Historical Hunts – Birth of a new Nation!
• Lead the exciting life of a rugged frontiersman from the 1700’s
• Survive the untamed frontiers in the New World
• Shoot with historical weaponry including Long Rifles & Flintlock Pist

• New Historical Hunt Region: Civil War! Coming Soon!
• Various improvements and other bug fixes

Updated Terms of Use. Please review them as these new Terms will apply to you if you continue to use this game after October 26, 2017, the date is

NEW MODE: Rod & Reel Fishing!
• Catch exotic fish in beautiful freshwater locations
• Time your taps at right moment to reel in energetic fish
• Collect fishing rods to reel in different types of fish
• Compete against other players around

• Improvements to Rod & Reel Fishing UI
• Bug fixes and other improvements
Bug fixes and other improvements

• Daily Quests – Complete daily goals to collect additional rewards. Quests refresh every day, so complete all 3 for maximum rewards!
• Bug fixes and other improvements
Bug fixes and other improvements to game performance

- New Hunting Supply Events live! Build hunting supplies over weekdays & gain score benefits in the Weekend Events. Improve your chances to top the leaderboards!
- Bug Fixes: We've optimized our game to improve stability and make the user experienc

• Exclusive Packs available for purchase during Hunting Tournaments!
• We've listened to you! It’s now easier to reach our Customer Care Team!
• A few improvements & bug fixes.

Hello hunters, it’s that time of the year! We’ve launched a new version of your favourite hunting game, just in time for hunting season!

What’s New:
Modes
- We’ve added new content to our Time Travel and Underwater modes along with some excit

What’s New:
• Enhanced Global Events!: We’ve listened to your feedback and made our global competitions even better, with more events and prizes! Compete against hunters around the world and win exclusive and unique prizes for each event!
• Bug Fixe
